Affix.Name: Adventurer
Affix.Desc: Opening a chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Adventurer's Golden Goblet
EQUIP_RING.Desc: The spoils of one of an adventurer's many expeditions. Though a little damaged, it is still an excellent find.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Adventurer's Tail Feather
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: The feather of an exotic bird rarely seen on this continent.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Adventurer's Bandana
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: A cloth garment worn at the forehead. Though soaked in sweat and covered in dust, it still beams with an adventurer's pride.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Adventurer's Flower
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: A resilient flower that survived the harsh environment of an ancient city. It is now proudly worn like a medal.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Adventurer's Pocket Watch
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: It's easy to lose track of time when you're adventuring where the sun doesn't shine, whether that's the depths of the abyss or the ruins of a lost city.
